title: Prepare Project Proposal
description: Create a detailed project proposal document with all necessary information.

title: Design Presentation Slides
description: Design and format slides for the upcoming project presentation.

title: Code Review for Bug Fixes
description: Review and fix any bugs found in the latest codebase.

title: Update Documentation
description: Update project documentation with the latest changes and improvements.

title: Implement User Authentication
description: Implement secure user authentication functionality in the application.

title: Data Fetching Optimization
description: Optimize data fetching mechanism for improved performance.

title: Performance Testing
description: Conduct thorough testing to assess and improve application performance.

title: UI Layout Issue Fixes
description: Identify and fix any layout issues in the user interface.

title: Deploy to Server
description: Deploy the application to the production server for public access.

title: Generate Release Notes
description: Prepare release notes highlighting key features and improvements.

title: Final Testing and QA
description: Conduct final testing and quality assurance checks before release.
